chapters.title: Chapter 8: The Seven-Striped Lass
chapters.info: Bayle Domon, p. 154—Stocky ship captain and smuggler from Illian. His ship was captured by Egeanin at Falme, and she was afraid Domon would recognize her the next time they met. She was right—he did. He became one of Egeanin's so'jhin. When Egeanin captured his ship, he was trying to drop the male a'dam in the ocean. The two are now involved in a romance (she purchased him so they could stay together), which no one else seems to understand—anyone who talks to either of them seems to find them impossible to get along with. He is now Leilwin's husband and so'jhin. Mat describes him as “not to bad a guy” except when he is around Leilwin. Since he is always around her, Mat considers him unmanageable. He remembers where the Tower of Ghenjei is. See also Shipless, Leilwin; Tamarath, Egeanin.
